title: Force of Attraction
description: When the heart sets its course, even home is no escape...  Alpha male shifter, Lieutenant Commander Bradi Janelle isn't looking for a mate. Hell, he goes out of his way to avoid the prospect altogether-until the sexy little number in the infirmary makes a mockery of his ladies' man facade. Now, trapped with her in an escape pod, she's way too close for comfort. Too close to deny himself the pleasure of her body.
author: Mandy M. Roth
